title: Nike remain masters of the unashamed as Mark Parker steps down in wake of Alberto Salazar scandal
text:
It just went and did it. No red faces, no mea culpas. Nike announced that Mark Parker was “stepping down” – which, if he is wearing a pair of those space-age ZoomX Vaporfly Next% will launch him at least 50 metres into an office in the sky – and claimed this had nothing whatsoever to do with its recent abolition of the Oregon Project in the wake of coach Alberto Salazar being banned for four years for alleged doping violations.

They say bad things happen in “threes” for unconnected reasons, but “they” happen to be old wives with their tales, not a multi-billion dollar corporation protecting...
description: It just went and did it.
